thread.section_title: Otticanet Recensioni| Recensioni dei clienti per Otticanet | www.otticanet.com | 7 di 526
thread.title: Alex

author: Alex
title: Alex
text: I'm usually quite skeptical of exclusively-online retailers, but my transaction couldn't have gone better. They tracked which items were in stock and available, and provided crystal-clear pictures of what I was getting. I made sure to try my selected pair on in another store before making a purchase. I placed my order effortlessly online, navigation was seamless, email confirmations were available every step of the way, and I received my genuine Tom Ford's a short-two-days after they shipped out (from halfway across the world). I'll definitely buy here again!
